facts.1: National Grape Popsicle Day is celebrated on May 27th to enjoy the refreshing and delicious treat of grape-flavored popsicles.
facts.2: Popsicles were invented by accident in 1905 by an 11-year-old boy named Frank Epperson.
facts.3: The day encourages people to cool off with grape popsicles, a favorite summer treat for children and adults alike.

facts.1: National Cellophane Tape Day celebrates the invention and versatile uses of cellophane tape, also known as Scotch tape.
facts.2: Cellophane tape was invented by Richard Drew in 1930 and has since become an essential household and office item.
facts.3: The day encourages people to get creative with cellophane tape, using it for crafts, wrapping gifts, and making quick repairs.

facts.1: Sunscreen Day is observed on May 27th to raise awareness about the importance of protecting your skin from harmful UV rays.
facts.2: Applying sunscreen helps prevent sunburn, skin damage, and reduces the risk of skin cancer.
facts.3: The day encourages people to use sunscreen regularly, especially during outdoor activities, and to practice other sun safety measures.
